Program Overview

The e-commerce course is designed to provide learners with a comprehensive understanding of the e-commerce industry and the strategies and tools required to launch, manage, and grow an e-commerce business. The program covers a wide range of topics, including the fundamentals of e-commerce, marketing, logistics, operations, and finance.

  • Product and Market Research

  • Copywriting

  • Financial Planning

  • Marketing Strategy

  • Social Media Marketing

  • Mini importation and Drop shipping

  • Communication

  • Customer Service

  • Inventory Management

Life As An E-Commerce Professional

The life of an e-commerce professional can be both exciting and challenging. E-commerce professionals are responsible for managing and growing online businesses, which requires diverse skill-sets and the ability to adapt to a constantly changing environment.

 

Typically, e-commerce professionals may be responsible for managing inventory levels, optimising product listings, analysing sales data, and developing marketing strategies and campaigns. They may also work with suppliers, manufacturers, and logistics partners to ensure that products are delivered to customers in a timely and cost-effective manner

 

An ecommerce expert needs to have a deep understanding of the online marketplace, customer psychology, and digital marketing techniques. They have to keep up with the latest trends and developments in the ecommerce industry, and continually adapt their strategies to stay ahead of the competition 

Despite the challenges, e-commerce can be highly rewarding for those passionate about entrepreneurship, innovation, and technology. Ecommerce professionals have the opportunity to build and grow businesses that can reach a global audience, and make a real impact on the lives of their customers. With the right skills and mindset, an ecommerce professional can enjoy a successful and fulfilling career in this fast-paced and dynamic industry.

Career Advantages

High demand

Ecommerce is a rapidly growing industry and there is a high demand for experts who can help businesses succeed in the online marketplace. As an ecommerce expert, you can expect to be in high demand and have many job opportunities available to you.

Career growth opportunities

E-commerce experts need to have a wide range of skills, including marketing, web design, customer service, analytics, and more. Developing these skills can make you more marketable and help you advance in your career.

Flexibility

E-commerce is a highly flexible industry, with many opportunities for remote work and freelance projects. This allows e-commerce experts to work from anywhere in the world and take on projects that fit their schedules.

High earning potential

E-commerce experts are in high demand and often command high salaries. Additionally, many e-commerce experts choose to work as freelancers or start their own ecommerce businesses, which can provide even greater earning potential.

Creative freedom

E-commerce experts are often responsible for designing and executing marketing campaigns, creating product listings, and developing website designs. This provides a lot of creative freedom and allows you to express your creativity and innovation.

What career will this programme prepare me for?

  • SEO Specialist

  • Social media manager

  • Paid advertising manager

  • Content marketer

  • Email marketing manager

  • Digital marketing manager

  • E-commerce manager

There are extra advantages of learning E-commerce at our institution. You will acquire the skills required for professional success thanks to our knowledgeable instructors and hands-on learning style. We offer personalized attention to all students, and our curriculum is designed to meet the needs of both beginners and more advanced learners. With access to a wealth of resources and the support of a dynamic community of learners and professionals, you will have everything you need to become a successful E-commerce expert.

How You Will Learn

Methods: Virtual and Physical classes, Business case-studies, Virtual projects, and Interactive quizzes.

Virtual Classes

You will participate in physical and live virtual classes that will provide a platform for discussions, question-and-answer sessions, and feedback. The classes are designed to be interactive, with students encouraged to ask questions and participate in group discussions.

Business Case Studies

The course will utilize real-life business case studies to provide you with practical insights and hands-on experience in navigating the world of ecommerce. You’ll learn from real-life examples of successful ecommerce businesses and discover the strategies and tactics they used to achieve their goals. By analyzing these case studies, you will gain a deeper understanding of the challenges and opportunities that exist in the ecommerce landscape and learn how to apply these insights to your own business ventures.

Projects

you will engage in projects that will allow you to apply what youve learned. The projects will involve creating an ecommerce website or improving an existing one, developing a marketing strategy for an ecommerce business, and analysing the performance of ecommerce campaigns. You will receive feedback and guidance from industry experts as you work on your projects, helping you develop the confidence and competence to succeed in the world of ecommece.

Interactive Quizzes

The program includes interactive quizzes that will test your understanding of the concepts and tools covered in each module. The quizzes are designed to be engaging and will provide instant feedback on the student's performance.

What You Will Learn

You will explore 8 modules on e-commerce and emerge as a skilled professional capable of building and executing successful e-commerce strategies. You will learn about e-commerce business models, product sourcing, marketing strategies, order fulfillment, and customer service, all of which are pivotal in the success of your e-commerce business. By the end of the course, you will have the knowledge and skills necessary to launch and run a successful e-commerce business.

Here’s what you will learn:

  • Module 1
  • Module 2
  • Module 3
  • Module 4
  • Module 5
  • Module 6
  • Module 7
  • Module 8

Testimonials

My job was one of the things that took a hit during the pandemic. I was devastated by this but a respected senior friend convinced me to go and improve my skills at PDMA so I'd be indispensable. He wasn't wrong. In 4 short weeks, the improvement was so obvious and profound that Lagos Business School approached me. In a very short while, using what I learned at PDMA, I did not just land a job, I rose to Manager ranks at Lagos Business School. Looking back, I am glad the last job ended...but I am most glad I went to PDMA.
Toba OlugosiClient Relationship Manager, Lagos Business School
After graduating from University, I knew needed digital skills if this economy was going to favor me. It didn’t take long to find PDMA, and I am glad I did. My experience at PDMA positioned me to land a job right after my graduation where I manage local international brands…it didn’t even take time to happen. I am really happy cos truly when you weigh it against the value you get, PDMA is just doing giveaways to help people like me get their lives started. PDMA Should Charge More
Ifeoluwa IsraelContent Writer
I AM DOING WELL! I loved marketing, the only problem was I didn't know how to do it. I knew I had to start from somewhere and I am glad I started from PDMA. PDMA started from the basics of marketing before we went into digital marketing and that was my eureka moment. I would have just known the tools and been totally clueless about converting customers. Today, I am the lead strategist for several multination brands and I can't even lie, PDMA laid the foundation for this career I am enjoying today.
Benjamin IkadeCreative Strategist, Xpark360

Frequently Asked Questions

WHAT IS DIGITAL MARKETING?

Digital marketing means using the internet and digital tools to promote products, services, and brands. It's about getting more people to know about a business and trust it by sharing ads and helpful content to bring in new customers and keep the current ones happy.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN LAGOS?

Digital marketing courses are reasonably priced, and the cost may differ depending on the institute. With a budget ranging from 150,000 to 300,000, you can acquire valuable digital marketing skills.

WHAT IF I AM NOT CLOSE TO THE VENUE OF THE TRAINING?

If you live far from the training location and can't come to class regularly, you can use our online platform. It lets you learn at your own speed and convenience. Visit pdmaonline.com to learn more about our digital marketing courses online.

WHICH CERTIFICATION IS THE BEST?

There are several good certifications for digital marketing, including:Premium Digital Marketing Academy Certification, Facebook Blueprint Certification, Google Analytics IQ Certification, Hootsuite Social Marketing Certification, Google Ads Certification, Zeo Digital Academy, Chartered Institute of Social Media Marketing and Digital Marketing, etc. 

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING DOES PDMA OFFER?

PDMA offers several digital marketing training programs, including in-class training, corporate training, and online training.

HOW MUCH DOES DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course in Nigeria can vary depending on the academy, but you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN THE PAYMENTS BE DONE IN INSTALLMENTS FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE?

Yes, you can make payments in installments for our digital marketing course, but the full payment should be completed before the class ends.

IS THERE A CERTIFICATE AT THE END OF THE DIGITAL MARKETING PROGRAM?

Yes. Upon completion of the digital marketing training, you will receive a certificate. Additionally, PDMA will guide you on how to obtain certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other relevant international digital marketing certification bodies

Our training programs include: In-class training, Corporate training, and Online training



WHAT DOES A DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE COST IN NIGERIA?

The cost of a digital marketing course can vary depending on the academy. In Nigeria, you should budget between 100,000 to 300,000 Naira.

CAN I PAY FOR YOUR DIGITAL MARKETING COURSE IN INSTALLMENTS?

Yes, you can pay in installments, but please ensure full payment is made before the class ends.

DO I RECEIVE A CERTIFICATE AFTER COMPLETING THE DIGITAL MARKETING TRAINING?

Absolutely, you'll receive a certificate once you finish the course, including all assignments and projects. We'll even assist you in obtaining certifications from Google, HubSpot, and other important international digital marketing bodies.

WHAT DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES ARE INCLUDED IN THE PROGRAM?

Our curriculum covers a wide range of courses, including: Online Marketing Strategy, Lead Generation, Sales Conversion, and Website Credibility, Web Design (WordPress),  Email Marketing, Fundamentals of Graphic Design, Google Analytics, Content Marketing/Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM).

ARE THESE DIGITAL MARKETING COURSES INCLUDED IN THE PACKAGE?

Yes. When you enroll, you'll receive training in all these courses. However, if you prefer to specialize in just one or a few of these courses, we offer customized packages to meet your specific needs.
